keyFacts: The document outlines the account balance and transaction details for a business checking account from July 1, 2016, to July 31, 2016.
The beginning balance was $406,770.13, with deposits totaling $56,262.60 and an ending balance of $413,032.73.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
The account is subject to final collection and receipt of proceeds in cash or by unconditional credit.
